body: Mission is to support backoffice domain of the global infrastructure in providing solutions to increase operational efficiency in Unix server environment and related services.Responsibilities:Produce standards and processes development for Unix infrastructure services worldwide.Provide world class operational services to support and maintain the back office related services.Support IT strategy by supporting new and existing services.Provide guidance and governance to other regions.System monitoring.Participate in the implementation of new services.Support new product deployments with installation, integration, testing, documentation, and training.Assist in implementation of plans that enhance technical operation, compliance with rules and regulations, and permit the deployment of new technology and support them.Define and compile the methods of procedures and documentation to support in the maintenance and day-to-day operation of the Unix systems.Technical requirements:Over 4 years working experience in a similar role in a large scale company.Technical degree in Computer ScienceRHEL Certified Systems Engineer certificatio.Strong expertise in VMWare, Solaris, HPUX, EMC and NetApp storage products/tools.Strong expertise in LVM, DNS, DHCP, NFS, SAP Systems.Ability to work closely with DBAs.Network Management experience.Ideal candidate:Flexible and adaptable with excellent ability to work cross functionally within an organization.Strong analytical skills, strong critical thinking, problem solving, and interpersonal skills, with a commitment to professional and service delivery excellence.Excellent written and oral communication and interpersonal skills.Fluent in English (verbal and written).
title: Senior Unix Admnistrator
locations: Dimitrie Pompei nr 6A, București, Municipiul București, România
